import axios from"axios";var endpoint="http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?";var API_KEY=process.env.REACT_APP_WEATHER_API_KEY;export default{// Search for weather
searchWeather:function searchWeather(lat,lon){var coordinates="lat=".concat(lat,"&lon=").concat(lon);var URL=endpoint+coordinates+"&appid="+API_KEY;return axios.get(URL);},// Saves weather to the saved weather point page
saveWeather:function saveWeather(weatherData){return axios.post("/api/weather",weatherData);},// Gets all saved weather
getAllWeather:function getAllWeather(){return axios.get("/api/weather");},// Gets the weather with the given id
getWeather:function getWeather(id){return axios.get("/api/weather/"+id);},// Deletes the weather with the given id
deleteWeather:function deleteWeather(id){return axios.delete("/api/weather/"+id);}};
